import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import './Topbar.css' class Topbar extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { loginModal: false } } handleModal = visible => this.setState({ loginModal: visible }) render() { return ( <> theWatchmen
this.handleModal(true)}>Iniciar sesión Registro
this.handleModal(false)}> Iniciar sesión ) } } export default Topbar
